about_the_game:
It's a sokoban game, but it's not limited to Sokobans. Specifically, it's an adventure puzzle game based on a sokoban mechanic.
There are various traps to prevent you from getting more gems, but rest assured, there are no monsters for you to fight.
All you have to do is push something, get the gem or go further.


Game story

A ship falls to a strange planet during an interplanetary voyage, and no one survives except the captain.
The technology of the alien planet is far superior to the technology of the ship, but the captain has the ability to go back in time for a short time, and any danger is not a question.
The captain, faced with a damaged ship, must find a way to repair it on the planet and escape the planet.

Game features
Rich game content : More than 30 game mechanics to make the sokoban more interesting. More than 60 level puzzles to explore and collect more exciting.


Simple operation : operation is limited to directional movement, one hand can play; No instant operation, no need to fight hand speed. Hints are also given for new mechanisms.

Character growth : A character can gain key items to improve certain abilities or discover hidden items
Fast movement : There is no correlation between levels, focusing on single-level puzzles. Characters can quickly return to a level they have already explored by choosing from it.
Nostalgia music : Quiet retro 8bit music, let people return to the era of pixel games.

name: Homesickness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A ship falls to a strange planet during an interplanetary voyage, and no one survives except the captain. The captain, faced with a damaged ship, must find a way to repair it on the planet and escape the planet.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean
